source.name: Q14
source.instructions:
Given the below Deployment: 

```yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: myapp-container
        image: nginx:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          failureThreshold: 3
```

In the event of unavailability, how long does it take for kube-proxy to stop routing traffic to a Pod (the time denoted by `x`)?
